title: 4.x: FormHelper confirm via data-confirm?

milestone.description:
4.0.0 is an *API breaking* release. It will:

* Remove the features deprecated in 3.x.

Code that works in the latest 3.x with no deprecation warnings should work in 4.0.0 as well.

See the roadmap for more information https://github.com/cakephp/cakephp/wiki/4.0-Roadmap
